description: This table contains registry record information that might be considered electronic health information (EHI).

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the record status (hidden, soft-deleted, etc...)


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Deleted


Hidden


Hidden and Soft Deleted

columns.name: REGISTRY_ID
columns.description: The associated registry settings record (HFR) that this registry record (RDI) is used for.

columns.name: REGISTRY_ID_REGISTRY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the registry record.

columns.name: REG_OVERRIDE_CONTEXT
columns.description: Stores the override context string to identify the correct override record for the registry settings record (HFR)
